body:
In GitLab by @ael-code on Nov 6, 2016, 14:28

On the Arch linux community repository the pycodestyle package is already at version `2.1.0` [1], thus flake8 installed via official repository cannot be used :(

[1]  https://www.archlinux.org/packages/community/any/python-pycodestyle/

In GitLab by @yan12125 on Nov 6, 2016, 19:14

Submitted an Arch Linux bug report: https://bugs.archlinux.org/task/51728

In GitLab by @wavi on Nov 6, 2016, 23:03

Would be great to get pycodestyle 2.1 support, since my build is breaking due to a bug that's fixed in 2.1 (https://github.com/PyCQA/pycodestyle/issues/561)
Originally I incorrectly reported it here https://gitlab.com/pycqa/flake8/issues/176 .

In GitLab by @yan12125 on Nov 6, 2016, 23:43

Arch Linux package maintainer Felix Yan introduced a patch: https://git.archlinux.org/svntogit/community.git/tree/trunk/pycodestyle-2.1.patch?h=packages/flake8

In GitLab by @yan12125 on Nov 8, 2016, 07:37

Mentioned in merge request !134

In GitLab by @yan12125 on Nov 8, 2016, 07:40

Submitted !134. Now it's working: (in flake8 source directory)
```
$ flake8 
./setup.py:38:1: E305 expected 2 blank lines after class or function definition, found 1
./src/flake8/plugins/pyflakes.py:41:1: E305 expected 2 blank lines after class or function definition, found 0
```

In GitLab by @yan12125 on Nov 8, 2016, 19:12

Mentioned in commit sigmavirus24/flake8@6595d3a08dedec4ff07683bf2c8f5aca2637fc5f

In GitLab by @sigmavirus24 on Nov 8, 2016, 19:12

Mentioned in commit sigmavirus24/flake8@35a35c2a617ac346790180783c616b692d79c03b

issue.title: Match noqa for users with explanations - [merged]

repository.name: flake8
repository.description: flake8 is a python tool that glues together pycodestyle, pyflakes, mccabe, and third-party plugins to check the style and quality of some python code.
